title: My account got hacked and i don't remember my email for the new password.
body: Can you send me a link at samuel.perron2001@gmail.com please beacuse i want my account back and if not I will lose 1k canadian dollars and I just went silver yesterday. Please take that in consideration and be quick please.

replies.body: Any time you have problems concerning your account, the best and quickest way to get that resolved is by shooting a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) over to our account team by selecting "I need help recovering my account". Once you can verify you were the account creator, they'll be able to help get you logged back in.
